name: Ballotpedia
notes: Primary source for most election data. Pages can be large/truncated by WebFetch. Consistent table structures across states.

name: Ballotpedia 2026 Election Calendar
notes: Living Google Sheet updated regularly. Has 'Earliest expected data availability' column. Includes local elections (filter to statewide for our use).

name: Ballotpedia 2026 Ballot Measures
notes: Check count against our DB (currently 65 for 2026). Updates when new measures are certified by states.

name: StateNavigate Data Downloads
notes: Structured CSV downloads. JS-rendered page — must download manually for now. Will likely add more datasets approaching election day.

name: StateNavigate Presidential Margins
notes: Already imported — all 50 states, 2024 presidential margins by legislative district. Google Sheet with public access.

name: StateNavigate Legislative Forecasts
notes: Probability-based forecasts per district. CSV files downloadable from data page. WV was first state (Feb 2026). URL pattern: replace {state} with state abbreviation (wv, va, etc). JS-rendered — CSV must be downloaded manually.

name: StateNavigate (social media)
notes: Good for election night tracking and post-election analysis. Also announces new data/forecast releases.

name: Chaz Nuttycombe (StateNavigate founder)
notes: StateNavigate founder. Tweets insight and calls during election night and after.

name: Taniel / Bolts Magazine
notes: Focused on state legislative races. Fast on special election calls. Bluesky primary platform.

name: Cook Political Report
notes: Already in DB — 36 governor race ratings. Uses Solid/Likely/Lean/Toss-up scale. May expand to legislative if they publish state-level ratings.

name: Sabato's Crystal Ball
notes: Already in DB — 36 governor race ratings. Same scale as Cook.

name: StateNavigate Forecast Methodology
notes: Documents how SN generates probability forecasts via simulations.

name: AP Politics
notes: Gold standard for race calls. Mostly federal but covers governor races. Best source for flipping elections from Called to Certified.

name: Cook Political Report (social media)
notes: Follow for rating updates through the cycle. Signal to re-check and update forecasts table.

name: Sabato's Crystal Ball / UVA Center for Politics (social media)
notes: Follow for Crystal Ball rating updates. Signal to refresh forecasts table.

name: Dave Wasserman / Redistrict
notes: Senior elections analyst at Cook Political Report. Known for early 'I've seen enough' race calls on competitive races.

name: 50 State Official Election Sites
notes: See separate file for all 50 state SoS/BoE URLs. Primary source for official certified vote tallies. ~15 states have bot protection requiring browser access.
